comment_0: This is really a moving song....makes me wanna cry.
comment_1: this really makes me think about my grandma that passed a year ago. my grandpa and his 6 kids sat in the seats cryin. i sat there not believing that she passed, but i didn't cry. i think holding in those emotions were bad. i love this song even if it's truly a sad song. i love it and hopefully others can as well!:)
